mapper.select: select s.*, r.rvTitle,r.rvlat,r.rvlng from stamp s Join review r On s.rvNo=r.rvNo
mapper.insert: insert into stampcheck(nickname,rvno,distance) SELECT * from (select #{nickName},r.rvno, CALC_DISTANCE(#{lat},#{lng}, rvlat, rvlng) DISTANCE from review r JOIN stamp s ON r.rvNo=s.rvNo where s.stisexpired=1) where DISTANCE < 1
insert into memberStamp select distinct nickName, rvno from stampcheck where nickName = #{nickName}
mapper.select: select count(*) From memberstamp m Join stampCheck s ON m.rvNO=s.rvNO where m.nickname = #{nickName} and m.rvno =(select distinct rvno from stampcheck where nickName = #{nickName})
SELECT * FROM review WHERE rvno in( SELECT rvno FROM memberstamp WHERE nickname=#{nickname})
select * from ( select tb.*, rownum as r from ( select * from stamp order by stNo desc) tb) where r between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from stamp order by stNo desc
mapper.update: update stamp set stexpireddate = (select stexpireddate from stamp where stno=#{stNo}) +7, stisexpired = 1 where stNo =#{stNo}
update stamp set stisexpired = 0, stexpireddate = sysdate where stNo =#{stNo}
